project.title: AI Demystified
project.description: AI training for non-technical learners. No mathematics or complicated jargon. Covers History of AI, Who the major players are in offering LLMs and AI Tools. Data and date preprocessing are covered. AI training methods for Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Reinforcement Learning and Neural Networks. Additional models and methods of combining models. The limitations for current AI that should be overcome in the future.
